exact_source: Pre-Completion, Cosmo has agreed to fund exploration activity of up to $150,000 on the Bingara Project and fund exploration activity of up to $75,000 on the Nundle Project. Post Completion, Cosmo has undertaken to use its best endeavours to expend at least $1,000,000 of exploration expenditure on the projects in the 12 months immediately following Completion. ( (A$150,000 + A$75,000 + A$1,000,000) * 0.70 USD/AUD = USD 857,500).
